text: "Dancin' Fool" is a song written by Burton Cummings and Domenic Troiano and performed by The Guess Who. It reached #14 in Canada,The Guess Who, "Dancin' Fool" Canadian Chart Position Retrieved March 12, 2015 #28 on the Billboard Hot 100,The Guess Who, "Dancin' Fool" US Chart Position Retrieved March 12, 2015 and #85 in Australia in 1975. The song was also released in the United Kingdom as a single, but it did not chart.The Guess Who, "Dancin' Fool" United Kingdom single release Retrieved March 12, 2015 The song was featured on their 1974 album, Flavours.The Guess Who, Flavours Retrieved March 12, 2015 The song was produced by Jack Richardson.The Guess Who, "Dancin' Fool" Canadian single release Retrieved March 12, 2015 ==References== Category:1974 songs Category:1974 singles Category:Songs written by Burton Cummings Category:The Guess Who songs Category:Song recordings produced by Jack Richardson (record producer) Category:RCA Victor singles
title: Dancin' Fool (The Guess Who song)
